PublicService.name: Granting of Lump-Sum Benefit for the Public Sector

evs.name: Photocopy of Identity Card.
evs.description: Copy of the applicant's police-issued identity card.

evs.name: Bank Account (IBAN)
evs.description: Copy of the bank book where the pension and lump-sum benefit will be deposited.

evs.name: Proof of Insurance
evs.description: Certificates of any previous employment in other insurance funds or sequential insurance.

evs.name: Certificate of Employment Changes
evs.description: Document certifying the employee's employment changes.

evs.name: Family Status Certificate
evs.description: Required if there are dependent family members.

evs.name: Tax Identification Number (TIN)
evs.description: Declaration of the TIN in the application.

evs.name: Social Security Number (SSN)
evs.description: Declaration of the SSN in the application.

evs.name: Personal and Employment Status Card (PESC)
evs.description: Document containing information about the employee's career.

evs.name: Lump-Sum Benefit Application
evs.description: Completed application form for the lump-sum benefit.

evs.name: Pension Grant Application
evs.description: Completed application form for granting the main pension.

evs.name: Notification of Disability Certification Result (N.D.C.R.)
evs.description: Certificate from the Disability Certification Center (D.C.C.) that determines the disability percentage.
